scripts.uploadbuildComplete: ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --quiet ./cartridges/** && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run compile:js && npm run compile:scss &&  npm run uploadCartridge && npm run build:sfra && npm run uploadCartridgeSfra
scripts.uploadComplete: npm run uploadCartridge && npm run uploadCartridgeSfra
scripts.uploadCartridgeSfra: rsync -a dw.json ../storefront-reference-architecture && cd ../storefront-reference-architecture && sgmf-scripts --uploadCartridge app_storefront_base && sgmf-scripts --uploadCartridge modules && sgmf-scripts --uploadCartridge bm_app_storefront_base
scripts.bd:prod: ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --quiet ./cartridges/** && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run compile:js && npm run compile:scss &&  npm run uploadCartridge
scripts.bd:dev: ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --quiet ./cartridges/** && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run compile:js && npm run compile:scss &&  npm run uploadCartridge
scripts.bd:devComplete: ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --quiet ./cartridges/** && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run compile:js && npm run compile:scss &&  npm run uploadComplete
scripts.build:sfra: cd ../storefront-reference-architecture && npm run compile:js && npm run compile:fonts && npm run compile:scss
scripts.setup:project: npm run init:sfra && npm run build:sfra
